name: Roy Tang
text: Er, I legitimately don't understand what you're claiming by asking me to watch that video. It talks about the legality of police officers shooting to kill criminals who are armed and dangerous. Am I correct that you are claiming that *all* the supposed DDS killings were done by policemen in the line of duty in self-defense against armed and dangerous criminals? AFAIK not even Duterte himself claims that. This video seems to be speaking about one particular instance only (IDK the context)
